title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“An investigation found the employee occasionally slept on duty for almost five years.” [From the York (Pennsylvania) Daily Record, 12 January 1987. Submitted by Margery H. Freas, New York.]
